main.name: AFAQ AHMAD BHATTI
main.description: I am a web development engineer. This project is a resume template that can be used as the project home page or resume page
main.bio: Experienced React web developer with a passion for creating dynamic and responsive user interfaces. Proficient in front-end technologies, adept at translating design concepts into efficient and visually appealing web applications.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Dynamic React developer with a strong proficiency in building modern and interactive user interfaces. Experienced in leveraging the latest front-end technologies to create scalable and efficient web applications. Passionate about crafting seamless user experiences and staying abreast of industry best practices.

education.description: Learn alot of things Except books and study
I dont know why am wasting my time in College

work.title: IT Administrator
work.description: Versatile IT expert with a comprehensive skill set encompassing network administration, cybersecurity, and systems integration. Proven track record of optimizing IT infrastructures for efficiency and security, coupled with a commitment to staying abreast of emerging technologies for innovative problem-solving.
